com.wiris.quizzes.api.ui

Interface AuthoringField

  • All Superinterfaces:
    QuizzesComponent, QuizzesField
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    EmbeddedAnswersEditor

    public interface AuthoringField
extends QuizzesField
    Field for authoring a correct answer of the question. It may be an embedded MathType or a text/image field and a button displaying the Wiris Quizzes Studio. This object is always built from QuizzesComponentBuilder.

    • Method Detail

      • setFieldType

        void setFieldType(AuthoringFieldType type)
        Configures the type of this element. It can be either a Wiris Quizzes Studio or simply an embedded MathType. This method must be called before the QuizzesComponent.getElement() call.

      • getFieldType

        AuthoringFieldType getFieldType()
        Returns the type of this field.

      • setConfiguration

        Set the configuration of the authoring field.
        Parameters:

      • showAuxiliarCas

        @Deprecated
void showAuxiliarCas(boolean visible)

        Parameters:
        visible - Whether to show the auxiliary cas option.

      • showAuxiliarCasReplaceEditor

        @Deprecated
void showAuxiliarCasReplaceEditor(boolean visible)
        Deprecated. Use showAuxiliaryCasReplaceEditor(boolean) instead.
        Add a third option on the auxiliary cas field that allows replacing the response editor by a CalcMe instance. Used in essay-like question types, as this option does not allow automatic grading.
        Parameters:
        visible - Whether to show this replacing option.

      • showAuxiliaryCasReplaceEditor

        void showAuxiliaryCasReplaceEditor(boolean visible)
        Add a third option on the auxiliary cas field that allows replacing the response editor by a CalcMe instance. Used in essay-like question types, as this option does not allow automatic grading.
        Parameters:
        visible - Whether to show this replacing option.

        visible - Whether to show the auxiliary text input option.
